name: JustiXX
description:
This is my first game (Do not judge strictly, and sorry for translating with the help of google translator) 

 You play as Sir Lancer You were sent to a dangerous dungeon, where many brave knights perished. You have to go through many traps and enemies. To eliminate whoever runs this dungeon.

Control A - Left D - Right Space - Jump. The control through arrows works the same way.

 Exit the game  Alt + Tab (The menu could not be done due to engine problems)

Game Design / Level Design / Script by sktwizz

Music by Atrium Carcer
